messages.content: Hi, my name is John Smith. You can reach me at john.smith@example.com or call +1-555-123-4567.
Hello! How can I help you today?
I need to reset my account. My email is john.smith@example.com and my SSN is 123-45-6789.
I can help with that. For security, please confirm the last four digits of your phone number.
